tweet.text: On Sept. 30, 1993, Powell retired from the U.S. Army as a four-star general. In his remarks, Powell concluded, “And finally, I want to thank the American people and the nation for the privilege of serving…So on this, my last hour in uniform, my heart is filled with gratitude…” https://t.co/cVfebIXtE0
tweet.html: On Sept. 30, 1993, Powell retired from the U.S. Army as a four-star general. In his remarks, Powell concluded, “And finally, I want to thank the American people and the nation for the privilege of serving…So on this, my last hour in uniform, my heart is filled with gratitude…”
